document.title: Simple Upper Arch Aligner Plan
document.summary: A straightforward treatment using clear aligners to address the upper arch. The expected duration for this simple case is about 4–6 months. Remote monitoring will be utilized throughout the treatment, with extensive attachments applied to achieve the desired tooth movements. Whitening is offered as part of the treatment package.
key_points: Simple case focusing on the upper arch
next_steps: Initiate treatment setup in the system
